hadiths.text: Mu'adhah (al-'Adawiyyah) said:I asked 'Aishah: Would the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) fast three days every month ? She replied: Yes. I asked: Which days in the month he used to fast ? She replied: He did not care which days of the month he fasted

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَالَ لاَ يُبَالِي مِنْ أَىِّ الشَّهْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Said That There is No Concern To Specify (The Day Of Fasting) Of The Month
